uPVT¶

Package calculates PVT propetries of fluids and properties of fluid flow

uPVT.PVT_correlations module¶

Created on Sat May 5 13:59:06 2018

@author: Rinat Khabibullin

Alexey Vodopyan

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_McCain_specificgravity(p_MPaa, rsb_m3m3, t_K, gamma_oil, gamma_gassp)¶
Параметры

  • p_MPaa – pressure in MPaa

  • rsb_m3m3 – gas-oil ratio at bubble poinr pressure, m3/m3

  • t_K – temperature in K

  • gamma_oil – specific oil density(by water)

  • gamma_gassp – specific gas density(by air) in separator

Результат

reservoir free gas specific gravity

ref1 book Mccain_w_d_spivey_j_p_lenn_c_p_petroleum_reservoir_fluid,third edition, 2011

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_compressibility_brine_Spivey_1MPa(t_K, p_MPaa, s_ppm, z=1.0, par=1)¶

Modified Spivey et al. correlation for brine(water) compressibility (2009)

Параметры

  • t_K – temperature, K

  • p_MPaa – pressure, MPaa

  • s_ppm – salinity, ppm

  • z – z-factor

  • par – parameter, 0 - methane-free brine, 1 - brine containing dissolved methane, 2 - brine containing partially dissolved methane

Результат

compressibility, 1/MPa

корреляция позволяет найти сжимаемость соленой воды с частично или полностью растворенным в ней метаном

ref 1 Spivey, J.P., McCain, W.D., Jr., and North, R. “Estimating Density, Formation

Volume Factor, Compressibility, Methane Solubility, and Viscosity for Oilfield Brines at Temperatures From 0 to 275°C, Pressures to 200 MPa, and Salinities to 5.7 mole/kg.” Journal of Canadian Petroleum Technology. Vol. 43, No. 7 (July 2004) 52–61.

ref 2 book Mccain_w_d_spivey_j_p_lenn_c_p_petroleum_reservoir_fluid,third edition, 2011

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_compressibility_gas_Mattar_1MPa(p_MPaa, t_K, ppc_MPa, tpc_K)¶

correlation for gas compressibility

Параметры

  • p_MPaa – pressure, MPaa

  • t_K – temperature, K

  • ppc_MPa – pseudocritical pressure, MPa

  • tpc_K – pseudocritical temperature, K

Результат

gas compressibility, 1/MPa

ref 1 Mattar, L., Brar, G.S., and Aziz, K. 1975. Compressibility of Natural Gases. J Can Pet Technol 14 (4): 77. PETSOC-75-04-08

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_compressibility_oil_Mccain_1MPa_greater(gamma_oil, gamma_gas, pb_MPa, p_MPa, rsb_m3m3, tres_K, gamma_gassp=0)¶

pass

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_compressibility_oil_Mccain_1MPa_lower()¶

pass

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_compressibility_oil_VB_1Mpa(rs_m3m3, t_K, gamma_oil, p_MPaa, gamma_gas=0.6)¶

oil compressibility according to Vasquez & Beggs (1980) correlation

Параметры

  • rs_m3m3 – solution gas-oil ratio, m3m3

  • t_K – temperature, K

  • gamma_oil – specific oil density (by water)

  • p_MPaa – pressure, MPaa

  • gamma_gas – specific gas density (by air)

Результат

coefficient of isothermal compressibility co_1MPa, 1/MPa

ref1 Vazquez, M. and Beggs, H.D. 1980. Correlations for Fluid Physical Property Prediction. J Pet Technol 32 (6): 968-970. SPE-6719-PA

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_deadoilviscosity_Beggs_cP(gamma_oil, t_K)¶

Correlation for dead oil viscosity

Параметры

  • gamma_oil – specific oil density (by water)

  • t_K – temperature, K

Результат

dead oil viscosity,cP

ref1 Beggs, H.D. and Robinson, J.R. “Estimating the Viscosity of Crude Oil Systems.”

Journal of Petroleum Technology. Vol. 27, No. 9 (1975)

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_density_brine_Spivey_kgm3(t_K, p_MPaa, s_ppm, par=1)¶

Modified Spivey et al. correlation for brine(water) density (2009)

Параметры

  • t_K – temperature, K

  • p_MPaa – pressure, MPaa

  • s_ppm – salinity, ppm

  • par – parameter, 0 - methane-free brine, 1 - brine containing dissolved methane

Результат

density, kg/m3

корреляция позволяет найти плотность соленой воды с растворенным в ней метаном

ref 1 Spivey, J.P., McCain, W.D., Jr., and North, R. “Estimating Density, Formation Volume Factor, Compressibility, Methane Solubility, and Viscosity for Oilfield Brines at Temperatures From 0 to 275°C, Pressures to 200 MPa, and Salinities to 5.7 mole/kg.” Journal of Canadian Petroleum Technology. Vol. 43, No. 7 (July 2004) 52–61.

ref 2 book Mccain_w_d_spivey_j_p_lenn_c_p_petroleum_reservoir_fluid,third edition, 2011

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_density_oil_Mccain(p_MPaa, pb_MPaa, co_1MPa, rs_m3m3, gamma_gas, t_K, gamma_oil, gamma_gassp=0)¶

Oil density according Standing, M.B., 1977; Witte, T.W., Jr., 1987; and McCain, W.D., Jr. and Hill, N.C.,

1995 correlation.

Параметры

  • p_MPaa – pressure, MPaa

  • pb_MPaa – bubble point pressure, MPaa

  • co_1MPa – coefficient of isothermal compressibility, 1/MPa

  • rs_m3m3 – solution gas-oil ratio, m3m3

  • gamma_gas – specific gas density (by air)

  • t_K – temperature, K

  • gamma_oil – specific oil density (by water)

  • gamma_gassp – specific gas density in separator(by air)

Результат

oil density,kg/m3

ref1 book Mccain_w_d_spivey_j_p_lenn_c_p_petroleum_reservoir_fluid,third edition, 2011

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_density_oil_Standing(p_MPaa, pb_MPaa, co_1MPa, rs_m3m3, bo_m3m3, gamma_gas, gamma_oil)¶

Oil density according Standing correlation.

Параметры

  • p_MPaa – pressure, MPaa

  • pb_MPaa – bubble point pressure, MPaa

  • co_1MPa – coefficient of isothermal compressibility, 1/MPa

  • rs_m3m3 – solution gas-oil ratio, m3m3

  • bo_m3m3 – oil formation volume factor, m3m3

  • gamma_gas – specific gas density (by air)

  • gamma_oil – specific oil density (by water)

Результат

oil density,kg/m3

ref1 book Brill 2006, Production Optimization Using Nodal Analysis

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_fvf_Glaso_m3m3_below(rs_m3m3, t_K, gamma_oil, gamma_gas, p_MPaa)¶

Glaso correlation(1980) for total formation volume factor below bubble point pressure

Параметры

  • rs_m3m3 – gas-oil ratio in m3/m3

  • t_K – temperature in K

  • gamma_oil – oil density (by water)

  • gamma_gas – gas density (by air)

  • p_MPaa – pressure in MPaa

Результат

total formation volume factor below bubble point pressure in m3/m3

ref Generalized Pressure-Volume-Temperature Correlations, Glaso, 1980

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_fvf_Glaso_m3m3_saturated(rs_m3m3, t_K, gamma_oil, gamma_gas)¶

Glaso correlation(1980) for formation volume factor at bubble point pressure

Параметры

  • rs_m3m3 – gas-oil ratio in m3/m3

  • t_K – temperature in K

  • gamma_oil – oil density (by water)

  • gamma_gas – gas density (by air)

Результат

formation volume factor at bubble point pressure in m3/m3

ref Generalized Pressure-Volume-Temperature Correlations, Glaso, 1980

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_fvf_Mccain_m3m3_below(density_oilsto_kgm3, rs_m3m3, density_oil_kgm3, gamma_gas)¶

Oil Formation Volume Factor according McCain correlation for pressure below bubble point pressure

Параметры

  • density_oilsto_kgm3 – density of stock-tank oil, kgm3

  • rs_m3m3 – solution gas-oil ratio, m3m3

  • density_oil_kgm3 – Oil density at reservoir conditions, kgm3

  • gamma_gas – specific gas density(by air)

Результат

formation volume factor bo, m3m3

ref1 book Mccain_w_d_spivey_j_p_lenn_c_p_petroleum_reservoir_fluid,third edition, 2011

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_fvf_Standing_m3m3_saturated(rs_m3m3, gamma_gas, gamma_oil, t_K)¶

Oil Formation Volume Factor according Standing equation at bubble point pressure

Параметры

  • rs_m3m3 – solution gas-oil ratio, m3m3

  • gamma_gas – specific gas density (by air)

  • gamma_oil – specific oil density (by water)

  • t_K – temperature, K

Результат

formation volume factor at bubble point pressure bo,m3m3

ref1 Volumetric and phase behavior of oil field hydrocarbon systems / M.B. Standing Standing, M. B. 1981

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_fvf_VB_m3m3_above(bob, cofb_1MPa, pb_MPaa, p_MPaa)¶

Oil Formation Volume Factor according equation for pressure above bubble point pressure

Параметры

  • bob – formation volume factor at bubble point pressure, m3m3

  • cofb_1MPa – weighted-average oil compressibility from bubblepoint pressure to a higher pressure of interest,1/MPa

  • pb_MPaa – bubble point pressure, MPa

  • p_MPaa – pressure, MPa

Результат

formation volume factor bo,m3m3

ref1 book Mccain_w_d_spivey_j_p_lenn_c_p_petroleum_reservoir_fluid,third edition, 2011

! Actually, this correlation is belonged ro Vasquez & Beggs (1980). In some sources is noted that this is Standing correlation.

ref2 Vazquez, M. and Beggs, H.D. 1980. Correlations for Fluid Physical Property Prediction. J Pet Technol 32 (6): 968-970. SPE-6719-PA

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_fvf_brine_Spivey_m3m3(t_K, p_MPaa, s_ppm)¶

Modified Spivey et al. correlation for brine(water) formation volume factor (2009)

Параметры

  • t_K – temperature, K

  • p_MPaa – pressure, MPaa

  • s_ppm – salinity, ppm

Результат

formation volume factor, m3/m3

корреляция позволяет найти объемный коэффициент для соленой воды с учетом растворенного метана

ref 1 Spivey, J.P., McCain, W.D., Jr., and North, R. “Estimating Density, Formation

Volume Factor, Compressibility, Methane Solubility, and Viscosity for Oilfield Brines at Temperatures From 0 to 275°C, Pressures to 200 MPa, and Salinities to 5.7 mole/kg.” Journal of Canadian Petroleum Technology. Vol. 43, No. 7 (July 2004) 52–61.

ref 2 book Mccain_w_d_spivey_j_p_lenn_c_p_petroleum_reservoir_fluid,third edition, 2011

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_gamma_gas_Mccain(rsp_m3m3, rst_m3m3, gamma_gassp, gamma_oil, psp_MPaa=0, tsp_K=0)¶

Correlation for weighted-average specific gravities of surface gases

Параметры

  • rsp_m3m3 – separator producing gas-oil ratio, m3m3

  • rst_m3m3 – stock-tank producing gas-oil ratio, m3m3

  • gamma_gassp – separator gas specific gravity

  • gamma_oil – specific oil density(by water)

  • psp_MPaa – pressure in separator, MPaa

  • tsp_K – temperature in separator, K

Результат

weighted-average specific gravities of surface gases

часто условия в сепараторе неизвестны, может считать и без них по приблизительной формуле

ref1 «Reservoir oil bubblepoint pressures revisited; solution gas–oil ratios and surface gas specific gravities», J. VELARDE, W.D. MCCAIN, 2002

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_gas_density_kgm3(t_K, p_MPaa, gamma_gas, z)¶

Equation for gas density from state equation

Параметры

  • t_K – temperature

  • p_MPaa – pressure

  • gamma_gas – specific gas density by air

  • z – z-factor

Результат

gas density

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_gas_fvf_m3m3(t_K, p_MPaa, z)¶

Equation for gas FVF

Параметры

  • t_K – temperature, K

  • p_MPaa – pressure, MPaa

  • z – z-factor

Результат

formation volume factor for gas bg, m3/m3

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_gasviscosity_Lee_cP(t_K, p_MPaa, z, gamma_gas)¶

Lee correlation for gas viscosity

Параметры

  • t_K – temperature, K

  • p_MPaa – pressure, MPaa

  • z – z-factor

  • gamma_gas – specific gas density (by air)

Результат

gas viscosity,cP

ref 1 Lee, A.L., Gonzalez, M.H., and Eakin, B.E. “The Viscosity of Natural Gases.” Journal of Petroleum Technology. Vol. 18 (August 1966) 997–1,000.

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_gwr_brine_Spivey_m3m3(s_ppm, z)¶

Modified Spivey et al. correlation for solution gas-water ratio of methane in brine(2009)

Параметры

  • s_ppm – salinity, ppm

  • z – z-factor

Результат

GWR, m3/m3

корреляция позволяет найти газосодержание метана в соленой воде

ref 1 Spivey, J.P., McCain, W.D., Jr., and North, R. “Estimating Density, Formation

Volume Factor, Compressibility, Methane Solubility, and Viscosity for Oilfield Brines at Temperatures From 0 to 275°C, Pressures to 200 MPa, and Salinities to 5.7 mole/kg.” Journal of Canadian Petroleum Technology. Vol. 43, No. 7 (July 2004) 52–61.

ref 2 book Mccain_w_d_spivey_j_p_lenn_c_p_petroleum_reservoir_fluid,third edition, 2011

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_heat_capacity_gas_Mahmood_Moshfeghian_JkgC(p_MPaa, t_K, gamma_gas)¶

gas heat capacity by Mahmood Moshfeghian for 0.1 to 20 MPa t should be noted that the concept of heat capacity is valid only for the single phase region.

Параметры

  • p_MPaa – pressure, MPaa

  • t_K – temperature, K

  • gamma_gas – specific gas density by air

Результат

gas heat capacity in JkgC = JkgK

ref1 https://www.jmcampbell.com/tip-of-the-month/2009/07/ variation-of-natural-gas-heat-capacity-with-temperature-pressure-and-relative-density/

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_heat_capacity_oil_Gambill_JkgC(gamma_oil, t_c)¶

Oil heat capacity in SI. Gambill correlation

Параметры

  • gamma_oil – specific oil density(by water)

  • t_c – temperature in C

Результат

heat capacity in SI - JkgC

ref1 Book: Brill J. P., Mukherjee H. K. Multiphase flow in wells. –

Society of Petroleum Engineers, 1999. – Т. 17. in Page 122

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_heat_capacity_oil_Wes_Wright_JkgC(gamma_oil, t_c)¶

Oil heat capacity in SI. Wes Wright method

Параметры

  • gamma_oil – specific oil density(by water)

  • t_c – temperature in C

Результат

heat capacity in SI - JkgC

ref1 https://www.petroskills.com/blog/entry/crude-oil-and-changing-temperature#.XQkEnogzaM8

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_heat_capacity_water_IAPWS_JkgC(t_c)¶

Теплоемкость дистилированной воды в диапазоне 5 < T < 95 C при 1 бар выше диапазона - линейная экстраполяция

Параметры

t_c – температура в С

Результат

теплоемкость в Дж / кг С

ref1 https://syeilendrapramuditya.wordpress.com/2011/08/20/water-thermodynamic-properties/

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_oil_viscosity_Beggs_VB_cP(deadoilviscosity_cP, rs_m3m3, p_MPaa, pb_MPaa)¶

function for calculating the viscosity at any pressure

Параметры

  • deadoilviscosity_cP – dead oil viscosity,cP

  • rs_m3m3 – solution gas-oil ratio, m3m3

  • p_MPaa – pressure, MPaa

  • pb_MPaa – bubble point pressure, MPaa

Результат

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_pb_AlMarhoun_MPaa(rsb_m3m3, gamma_oil=0.86, gamma_gas=0.6, t_K=350)¶

pass

bubble point pressure calculation according to Al-Marhoun (1985) correlation

Middle-East oil

Параметры

  • rsb_m3m3 – solution ration at bubble point, must be given, m3/m3

  • gamma_oil – specific oil density (by water)

  • gamma_gas – specific gas density (by air)

  • t_K – temperature, K

Результат

bubble point pressure abs in MPa

ref1 PYT Correlations for Middle East Crude Oils, Muhammad All AI.Marhoun, Journal of Petroleum Technology. May 1988

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_pb_Glaso_MPaa(rs_m3m3, t_K, gamma_oil, gamma_gas)¶

Glaso correlation(1980) for bubble point pressure

Параметры

  • rs_m3m3 – gas-oil ratio in m3/m3

  • t_K – temperature in K

  • gamma_oil – oil density (by water)

  • gamma_gas – gas density (by air)

Результат

bubble point pressure im MPa abs

ref Generalized Pressure-Volume-Temperature Correlations, Glaso, 1980

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_pb_Standing_MPaa(rsb_m3m3, gamma_oil=0.86, gamma_gas=0.6, t_K=350)¶

bubble point pressure calculation according to Standing (1947) correlation

Параметры

  • rsb_m3m3 – solution ration at bubble point, must be given, m3/m3

  • gamma_oil – specific oil density (by water)

  • gamma_gas – specific gas density (by air)

  • t_K – temperature, K

Результат

bubble point pressure abs in MPa

ref1 «A Pressure-Volume-Temperature Correlation for Mixtures of California Oil and Gases», M.B. Standing, Drill. & Prod. Prac., API, 1947.

ref2 «Стандарт компании Юкос. Физические свойства нефти. Методы расчета.» Афанасьев В.Ю., Хасанов М.М. и др. 2002 г

bubble point pressure calculation according to Valko McCain (2002) correlation

Параметры

  • rsb_m3m3 – solution ration at bubble point, must be given, m3/m3

  • gamma_oil – specific oil density (by water)

  • gamma_gas – specific gas density (by air)

  • t_K – temperature, K

Результат

bubble point pressure abs in MPa

ref SPE «Reservoir oil bubblepoint pressures revisited; solution gas–oil ratios and surface gas specific gravities»

    1. McCain Jr.,P.P. Valko,

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_pseudocritical_pressure_MPa(gamma_gas, y_h2s=0.0, y_co2=0.0, y_n2=0.0)¶

correlation for pseudocritical pressure taking into account the presense of non-hydrocarbon gases

Параметры

  • gamma_gas – specific gas density (by air)

  • y_h2s – mole fraction of the hydrogen sulfide

  • y_co2 – mole fraction of the carbon dioxide

  • y_n2 – mole fraction of the nitrogen

Результат

pseudocritical pressure, MPa

ref 1 Piper, L.D., McCain, W.D., Jr., and Corredor, J.H. “Compressibility Factors for Naturally Occurring Petroleum Gases.” Gas Reservoir Engineering. Reprint Series. Richardson, TX: SPE. Vol. 52 (1999) 186–200

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_pseudocritical_temperature_K(gamma_gas, y_h2s=0.0, y_co2=0.0, y_n2=0.0)¶

correlation for pseudocritical temperature taking into account the presense of non-hydrocarbon gases

Параметры

  • gamma_gas – specific gas density (by air)

  • y_h2s – mole fraction of the hydrogen sulfide

  • y_co2 – mole fraction of the carbon dioxide

  • y_n2 – mole fraction of the nitrogen

Результат

pseudocritical temperature, K

ref 1 Piper, L.D., McCain, W.D., Jr., and Corredor, J.H. “Compressibility Factors for Naturally Occurring Petroleum Gases.” Gas Reservoir Engineering. Reprint Series. Richardson, TX: SPE. Vol. 52 (1999) 186–200

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_rs_Standing_m3m3(p_MPaa, pb_MPaa=0, rsb_m3m3=0, gamma_oil=0.86, gamma_gas=0.6, t_K=350)¶

Gas-oil ratio calculation inverse of Standing (1947) correlation for bubble point pressure

Параметры

  • p_MPaa – pressure, MPa

  • pb_MPaa – buble point pressure, MPa

  • rsb_m3m3 – gas-oil ratio at the bubble point pressure, m3/m3

  • gamma_oil – specific oil density (by water)

  • gamma_gas – specific gas density (by air)

  • t_K – temperature, K

Результат

gas-oil ratio in m3/m3

ref1 «A Pressure-Volume-Temperature Correlation for Mixtures of California Oil and Gases», M.B. Standing, Drill. & Prod. Prac., API, 1947.

ref2 «Стандарт компании Юкос. Физические свойства нефти. Методы расчета.» Афанасьев В.Ю., Хасанов М.М. и др. 2002 г может считать в случае если нет давления насыщения и газосодержания при давлении насыщения, корреляция не точная

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_rs_Velarde_m3m3(p_MPaa, pb_MPaa=10, rsb_m3m3=100, gamma_oil=0.86, gamma_gas=0.6, t_K=350)¶

Solution Gas-oil ratio calculation according to Velarde McCain (1999) correlation

Параметры

  • p_MPaa – pressure, MPa

  • pb_MPaa – buble point pressure, MPa

  • rsb_m3m3 – gas-oil ratio at the bubble point pressure, m3/m3

  • gamma_oil – specific oil density (by water)

  • gamma_gas – specific gas density (by air)

  • t_K – temperature, K

Результат

gas-oil ratio in m3/m3

ref1 «Correlation of Black Oil Properties at Pressures Below Bubblepoint Pressure—A New Approach», J. VELARDE, T.A. BLASINGAME Texas A&M University, W.D. MCCAIN, JR. S.A. Holditch & Associates, Inc 1999

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_rsb_Mccain_m3m3(rsp_m3m3, gamma_oil, psp_MPaa=0, tsp_K=0)¶

Solution Gas-oil ratio at bubble point pressure calculation according to McCain (2002) correlation taking into account the gas losses at separator and stock tank

Параметры

  • rsp_m3m3 – separator producing gas-oil ratio, m3m3

  • gamma_oil – specific oil density(by water)

  • psp_MPaa – pressure in separator, MPaa

  • tsp_K – temperature in separator, K

Результат

solution gas-oil ratio at bubble point pressure, rsb in m3/m3

часто условия в сепараторе неизвестны, может считать и без них по приблизительной формуле

ref1 «Reservoir oil bubblepoint pressures revisited; solution gas–oil ratios and surface gas specific gravities», J. VELARDE, W.D. MCCAIN, 2002

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_saturatedoilviscosity_Beggs_cP(deadoilviscosity_cP, rs_m3m3)¶

Correlation for oil viscosity for pressure below bubble point

Параметры

  • deadoilviscosity_cP – dead oil viscosity,cP

  • rs_m3m3 – solution gas-oil ratio, m3m3

Результат

oil viscosity,cP

ref1 Beggs, H.D. and Robinson, J.R. “Estimating the Viscosity of Crude Oil Systems.”

Journal of Petroleum Technology. Vol. 27, No. 9 (1975)

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_surface_tension_go_Abdul_Majeed_Nm(t_K, gamma_oil, rs_m3m3)¶

Корреляция Абдул-Маджида (2000 г.) для поверхностного натяжения нефти, насыщенной газом

Параметры

  • t_K – температура, градусы Кельвина

  • gamma_oil – относительная плотность нефти

  • rs_m3m3 – газосодержание, м3 / м3

Результат

поверхностное натяжение на границе нефть-газ, Н / м

Источник: Справочник инженера-нефтяника. Том 1. Введение в нефтяной инжиниринг. Газпром Нефть

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_surface_tension_go_Baker_Swerdloff_Nm(t_K, gamma_oil, p_MPa)¶

Корреляция Бэйкера и Свердлоффа (1955 г.) для поверхностного натяжения нефти, насыщенной газом

Параметры

  • t_K – температура, градусы Кельвина

  • gamma_oil – относительная плотность нефти

  • p_MPa – давление, МПа

Результат

поверхностное натяжения на границе нефть-газ в Н /м

Источник: Справочник инженера-нефтяника. Том 1. Введение в нефтяной инжиниринг. Газпром Нефть

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_surface_tension_gw_Sutton_Nm(rho_water_kgm3, rho_gas_kgm3, t_c)¶

Корреляция Саттона для поверхностного натяжения на границе вода-газ

Параметры

  • rho_water_kgm3 – плотность воды кг / м3

  • rho_gas_kgm3 – плотность газа кг / м3

  • t_c – температура в С

Результат

поверхностное натяжение на границе вода-газ, Н / м

ref 1 Pereira L. et al. Interfacial tension of reservoir fluids: an integrated experimental and modelling investigation : дис. – Heriot-Watt University, 2016. page 41

ref2 Ling K. et al. A new correlation to calculate oil-water interfacial tension //SPE Kuwait International Petroleum Conference and Exhibition. – Society of Petroleum Engineers, 2012.

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_thermal_conductivity_gas_methane_WmK(t_c)¶

Теплопроводность метана

Параметры

t_c – температура в С

Результат

теплопроводность в Вт / м К

Данная функкия является линейным приближением табличных значений при 1 бар

требует корректировки, является временной затычкой, взята от безысходности

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_thermal_conductivity_oil_Abdul_Seoud_Moharam_WmK(gamma_oil, t_c)¶

  • t_c – temperature in C

thermal conductivity in SI - wt / m K

ref1 Tovar L. P. et al. Overview and computational approach for studying the physicochemical characterization of high-boiling-point petroleum fractions (350 C+) // Oil & Gas Science and Technology–Revue d’IFP Energies nouvelles. – 2012. – Т. 67. – №. 3. – С. 451-477.

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_undersaturatedoilviscosity_Petrovsky_cP(p_MPaa, pb_MPaa, bubblepointviscosity_cP)¶

viscosity correlation for pressure above bubble point

Параметры

  • pb_MPaa – bubble point pressure, MPaa

  • bubblepointviscosity_cP – oil viscosity at bubble point pressure, cP

ref 1 Petrosky, G.E. and Farshad, F.F. “Viscosity Correlations for Gulf of Mexico Crude Oils.” Paper SPE 29468. Presented at the SPE Production Operations Symposium, Oklahoma City (1995)

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_viscosity_brine_MaoDuan_cP(t_K, p_MPaa, s_ppm)¶

Mao-Duan correlation for brine(water) viscosity (2009)

  • p_MPaa – pressure, MPaa

  • s_ppm – salinity, ppm

ref 1 Mao, S., and Duan, Z. “The Viscosity of Aqueous Alkali-Chloride Solutions up to

623 K, 1,000 bar, and High Ionic Strength.” International Journal of Thermophysics. Vol. 30 (2009) 1,510–1,523.

ref 2 book Mccain_w_d_spivey_j_p_lenn_c_p_petroleum_reservoir_fluid,third edition, 2011

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_weightedcompressibility_oil_Mccain_1MPa_greater(gamma_oil, gamma_gas, pb_MPa, p_MPa, rsb_m3m3, tres_K, gamma_gassp=0)¶

pass

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_zfactor_BrillBeggs(ppr, tpr)¶

correlation for z-factor according Beggs & Brill correlation (1977)

используется для приближения функции дранчука

Параметры

  • ppr – preudoreduced pressure

  • tpr – pseudoreduced temperature

Результат

z-factor

Можно использовать при tpr<=2 и ppr<=4

при tpr <== 1.5 ppr<=10

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_zfactor_DAK(p_MPaa, t_K, ppc_MPa, tpc_K)¶

correlation for z-factor

Параметры

  • p_MPaa – pressure, MPaa

  • t_K – temperature, K

  • ppc_MPa – pseudocritical pressure, MPa

  • tpc_K – pseudocritical temperature, K

Результат

z-factor

range of applicability is (0.2<=ppr<30 and 1.0<tpr<=3.0) and also ppr < 1.0 for 0.7 < tpr < 1.0

ref 1 Dranchuk, P.M. and Abou-Kassem, J.H. “Calculation of Z Factors for Natural Gases Using Equations of State.” Journal of Canadian Petroleum Technology. (July–September 1975) 34–36.

uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_correlations.unf_zfactor_DAK_ppr(ppr, tpr)¶

correlation for z-factor

Параметры

  • ppr – pseudoreduced pressure

  • tpr – pseudoreduced temperature

Результат

z-factor

range of applicability is (0.2<=ppr<30 and 1.0<tpr<=3.0) and also ppr < 1.0 for 0.7 < tpr < 1.0

ref 1 Dranchuk, P.M. and Abou-Kassem, J.H. “Calculation of Z Factors for Natural Gases Using Equations of State.” Journal of Canadian Petroleum Technology. (July–September 1975) 34–36.

uPVT.PVT_fluids module¶

Created on Mon Sept 04 2017

@author: rnt

UniflocPy

класс для расчета uPVT свойств углеводородных флюидов и воды

class uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_fluids.FluidBlackOil(gamma_oil=0.86, gamma_gas=0.6, gamma_wat=1.0, rsb_m3m3=200.0, gamma_gassp=0, y_h2s=0, y_co2=0, y_n2=0, s_ppm=0, par_wat=0, pbcal_bar=-1.0, tpb_C=80, bobcal_m3m3=1.2, muobcal_cP=0.5)¶

Базовые классы: object

Описание смеси нефти, газа и воды по модели нелетучей нефти

Описание флюида - скважинной продукции Класс обеспечивает расчет свойств флюида при заданных термобарических условиях по одному набору корреляционных зависимостей классы потомки могут менять набор корреляционных зависимостей для уточнения расчета

property bg_m3m3¶

return gas formation volume factor at working condition

property bo_m3m3¶

return oil formation volume factor at working condition

property bw_m3m3¶

return water formation volume factor at working condition

calc(p_bar, t_c)¶

recalculate all parameters according to some pressure and temperature

property compr_gas_1bar¶

return gas compressibility at working condition

property compr_oil_1bar¶

return oil compressibility at working condition

property compr_wat_1bar¶

return water compressibility at working condition

property heatcap_gas_jkgc¶

return gas heat capacity at working condition

property heatcap_oil_jkgc¶

return oil heat capacity at working condition

property heatcap_wat_jkgc¶

return water heat capacity at working condition

property mu_gas_cP¶

return gas viscosity at working condition

property mu_oil_cP¶

return oil viscosity at working condition

property mu_wat_cP¶

return water viscosity at working condition

property pb_bar¶

return bubble point pressure an bar absolute

property rho_gas_kgm3¶

return gas density at working condition

property rho_gas_sckgm3¶

component density at standard condition, read only

property rho_oil_kgm3¶

return oil density at working condition

property rho_oil_stkgm3¶

return oil density at working condition

property rho_wat_kgm3¶

return water density at working condition

property rs_m3m3¶

return gas oil solution ratio at working condition

property rsw_m3m3¶

return gas water solution ratio at working condition

property sigma_oil_gas_Nm¶

return oil surface tension at working condition

property sigma_wat_gas_Nm¶

return water surface tension at working condition

property thermal_conduct_gas_wmk¶

return gas thermal conductivity at working condition

property thermal_conduct_oil_wmk¶

return oil thermal conductivity at working condition

property thermal_conduct_wat_wmk¶

return water thermal conductivity at working condition

property thermal_expansion_wat_1c¶

return water thermal expansion coefficient at working condition

property z¶

return gas z factor (compressibility) at working condition

class uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_fluids.FluidFlow(fluid=<uniflocpy.uPVT.PVT_fluids.FluidStanding object>)¶

calc(p_bar, t_c)¶

расчет свойств потока для заданных термобарических условий
